about.title: Beyond Code: Who I Am
about.description: My passions fuel my creativity, shaping how I build and solve problems. Tech, music, travel. Everything inspires my work.

interests.F1Fan: F1 is all about speed, strategy, and pure adrenaline. Every race is a showcase of technology and intensity. 🏁 🏎️
interests.MyFriends: Nothing beats laughter, moments, and crazy adventures with friends. They always make life more fun. 🥳 🎮
interests.MusicAddict: Music is always there: it inspires, motivates, and accompanies every moment. Life needs a great soundtrack. 🎵 🎸
interests.CatLover: Cats have pure style: independent, affectionate, and with more personality than many humans. 😺 🐈‍⬛
interests.TARS: *Interstellar* is art: science, emotions, and a soundtrack that leaves you traveling through time. 🚀 🪐
interests.InLove: Having someone special is the best: love, support, and unique moments that make everything better. 💕 😍
interests.WanderLust: Traveling is the best investment: you discover, learn, and create memories that last forever. ✈️ 🏖️
interests.CoderLife: Being a dev means turning ideas into reality. Code, coffee, and many sleepless nights fixing bugs. 🤖 💾
interests.ZeroMiedo: Wrestling is pure passion. Heroes, villains, and the spectacle that always gives you chills. 💪 🔥
interests.FamilyFirst: Family is everything: love, laughter, unconditional support, and a good homemade meal. 🏆 ❤️
interests.TopFood: Mexican food is next level: tacos, mole, pozole, and that perfect touch of spice. 🌶️ 🇲🇽
